      • paramNames

        public List<String> paramNames()
        Specified by:
        paramNames in interface  NativeRequest
        Returns:
        List with all the parameter names from query string plus any other form/multipart param names (excluding file uploads). This method should NOT returns null, absence of params is represented by an empty list.
